text: @tomselliott @SpeakerPelosi Exactly what is crazy Nancy Pelosi doing to help stop the coronavirus ? Is she volunteering or doing anything ? Or just complaining about what she perceives President Trump and every Republican is doing ? Can’t wait for her speaker job to end in November.
